name: Todd the Tubby Toad
description:
A 2D Physics base platform game with a Tubby Toad 

Todd the tubby toad was following and eating a candy trail… until he fell into an old underground candy factory. Stuck in this mysterious place, he must find his way out. However, his tubby body doesn't let him walk around very well so he needs to use his tongue to grapple and roll to the exit.

RECOMMEND TO PLAY ON FULLSCREEN FOR THE CAMERA TO WORK AS INTENDED. Controls

Left mouse to TONGUE 

Spacebar to Hug

A and D to Roll

W to  Reduce Tongue

S  to Increase Tongue

Team IKEA GAMES

Game Programmer / UI Artist: Andre Borja Miranda - Itch.io / Linkedin

Project Manager / Level Designer: Eduardo Cavalcante Almeida - Itch.io / Linkedin

Sound Designer / Artist: Marie Kyla Englis - Itch.io

Try to find the secret cake ending...
